name: Item Barcode ZPL
raw_commands:
{%- set item_name = doc.item_name or "Unnamed Item" -%}
{%- set item_price = (doc.standard_rate or 0) | float -%}
{%- set barcode_value = frappe.form_dict.get("barcode_value") or "" -%}

^XA
^CI28
^PW320
^LL200
^LH0,20
^SD15

^FO100,20^A0N,18,20^FD{{ item_name }}^FS
^FO90,50^BY2,3,50^BEN,50,Y,N^FD{{ barcode_value }}^FS
^FO90,130^A0N,25,32^FDBDT. {{ "%.2f"|format(item_price) }}^FS

^XZ
